'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|landmass]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A large stretch of tropical islands to the south of [[Maje Island]].

==Locations==
;Northeastern islands
[[File:PE2 Kangati Islands NE.png|left|thumb|300px]]
* The northeastern reef contains a lootable shipwreck.<br clear="left" />
;[[Tangaloa Island]]
[[File:PE2 Tangaloa Island.png|left|thumb|300px]]
* The desert island to the southeast is a remote one, where the ''Imposter's Lament'' beached, leaving behind its tortured crew. The major location here is the ruined [[Temple of Tangaloa ruins|Temple of Tangaloa]], together with the shipwreck itself. You can explore Amira's Whisper for a confrontation with the dead. You can ask [[Xoti]] to gather the spirits, bypassing the fight and gaining [[Elewys' Locket]]. You can then loot the shipwreck (standard fare) and head over to the ruined temple of Tangaloa to find a new crew member.<br clear="left" />
;Southwestern island
[[File:PE2 Rice Farm Kangati Isle.png|left|thumb|300px]]
* A small island to the southwest of the chain, with a rice farm.
